results.title: Promotion of bone formation by simvastatin in polyethylene particle-induced osteolysis.
results.text_hl: Promotion of bone formation by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Polyethylene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020959 @@@polyethylene@@@ particle-induced @<m>DISEASE_Osteolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010014 @@@osteolysis@@@.

results.title: [A comparison of the antiresorptive effects of bisphosphonates and statins on polyethylene particle-induced osteolysis].
results.text_hl: In this study the antiresorptive effects of the @CHEMICAL_Diphosphonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004164 @@@bisphosphonate@@@ @CHEMICAL_Zoledronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077211 @@@zoledronate@@@ and the statin @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on ultra high molecular weighted polyethylene (UHMWPE) particle-induced @<m>DISEASE_Osteolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010014 @@@osteolysis@@@ were compared.

citations.NLM: von Knoch F, Wedemeyer C, Heckelei A, Sprecher C, Saxler G, Hilken G, Henschke F, von Knoch M, Bereiter H, Löer F, von Knoch M. [A comparison of the antiresorptive effects of bisphosphonates and statins on polyethylene particle-induced osteolysis]. Biomed Tech (Berl). 2005 Jun;50(6):195-200. PMID: 16003921

results.title: Influence of Statins locally applied from orthopedic implants on osseous integration
results.text_hl: The question arises why bone integrational processes deteriorated under @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ exposure when compared to controls.

citations.NLM: Pauly S, Back DA, Kaeppler K, Haas NP, Schmidmaier G, Wildemann B. Influence of Statins locally applied from orthopedic implants on osseous integration BMC Musculoskelet Disord. 2012 Oct 26;13():208. PMID: 23102098

results.title: Simvastatin prevents skeletal metastasis of breast cancer by an antagonistic interplay between p53 and CD44.
results.text_hl: Here, we report that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ acts as an inhibitor of @<m>DISEASE_Osteolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010014 @@@osteolysis@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ @DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@skeletal metastasis@@@ of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@mammary cancer@@@ cell @CELLLINE_CVCL:0062 @@@MDA-MB-231@@@, which expresses the mutant p53R280K.

citations.NLM: Mandal CC, Ghosh-Choudhury N, Yoneda T, Choudhury GG, Ghosh-Choudhury N. Simvastatin prevents skeletal metastasis of breast cancer by an antagonistic interplay between p53 and CD44. J Biol Chem. 2011 Apr 1;286(13):11314-27. PMID: 21199873
